projectArray.title: Wikipedia API App
projectArray.text: Run searches in the Wikipedia database, or retrieve random articles. Dark theme available.

projectArray.title: Weather API App
projectArray.text: A simple API call to retrieve weather information based on ZIP code.

projectArray.title: My Blog
projectArray.text: A multi-page site using EJS to create section templates and cross reference elements.

projectArray.title: Random Quote Machine
projectArray.text: A simple React project that calls an API to fetch and display some motivation.

projectArray.title: Drum Machine
projectArray.text: A drum machine, built using React. Easily customizable with additional banks.

projectArray.title: To-Do List App
projectArray.text: Synced with the MongoDB Atlas cloud to store and keep track of multiple to-do lists.

projectArray.title: Newsletter API
projectArray.text: Uses express routing calls to communicate with my Mail Chimp account.

projectArray.title: Sample Documentation Page
projectArray.text: Reorganized a functional documentation page of a topic I find most useful.
